name: NetSuite ERP
description: Integrate with NetSuite ERP to search, get, create and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Search for records in NetSuite by record type. Supports filtering and field selection. Returns a list of matching records.

tools.name: Get Record
tools.description: Get a specific NetSuite record by its type and internal ID. Returns all accessible fields for the record.

tools.name: Create Record
tools.description: Create a new record in NetSuite. Specify the record type and field values.

tools.name: List Saved Searches
tools.description: List saved searches in NetSuite. Returns search names, types, and IDs. Useful for discovering available reports.

tools.name: Run Suiteql
tools.description: Execute a SuiteQL query against NetSuite. SuiteQL is a SQL-like query language for NetSuite data. Returns a formatted result set.
